I’m all for actors and performers transforming themselves for a role but the notion that her career before this was somehow “less-than” is not cool. Performers evolve and change but I don’t hear people denigrating Ziggy Stardust

Anyone else really creeped out by the way Lady Gaga is being talked about in the press tour for A Star is Born? The assertion that she is/was hiding her “true” self before acting in this film feel regressive and gross.
